Home » 30Vbh Vibhaṅgapāḷi » 5 Indriyavibhaṅga
5.2 Pañhāpucchaka
Indriyavibhaṅga
Pañhāpucchaka
221.
886Bāvīsatindriyāni—  cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, sukhindriyaṃ, dukkhindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, domanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ.
Indriyavibhaṅga
Pañhāpucchaka
222.
887Bāvīsatīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā…pe…  kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
  • 5.2.1 Tika
  • 5.2.2 Duka
